name: Painkiller
summary: Painkiller is a first-person shooter video game released on April 12, 2004. It was developed by Polish game studio People Can Fly and published by DreamCatcher Interactive. It is notable for using the Havok 2.0 physics engine extensively. The single player campaign gameplay involves killing large numbers of monsters. The game was particularly well received for its multiplayer experience.
